## Table of ROM checksums

Here are the CRC-16/XModem values for all of the Model T ROMs which
have been reported so far. If you find one not listed, please open an
[issue](issues) so it can be added to the list. Ideally, include a
copy of your ROM, but at a minimum, please include the calculated CRC
and a name to call your variation.

[issues]: https://github.com/hackerb9/crc16-modelt/issues "Report a bug"


### Original system ROMs
The system ROMs as they came from the factory back in the 1980s.
|Machine Name               |Version                                         |CRC-16|ROM size|
|------------               |-------                                         |-----:|-------:|
|[Kyocera Kyotronic 85      |orig](ROMs/Kyocera_Kyotronic_85+orig.bin)       | F08D | 32K    |
|[NEC PC-8201               |A orig](ROMs/NEC_PC-8201+A_orig.bin)            | A48D | 32K    |
|[NEC PC-8300               |orig](ROMs/NEC_PC-8300+orig.bin)                | 9FF5 | 128K   |
|[Olivetti M10 Eur          |orig](ROMs/Olivetti_M10_Eur+orig.bin)           | 5DD2 | 32K    |
|[Olivetti M10 North America|orig](ROMs/Olivetti_M10_North_America+orig.bin) | 5D9F | 32K    |
|[Tandy 102 uk              |orig](ROMs/Tandy_102_uk+orig.bin)               | 5CF0 | 32K    |
|[Tandy 102 us              |orig](ROMs/Tandy_102_us+orig.bin)               | 1C6F | 32K    |
|[Tandy 200                 |M13 orig](ROMs/Tandy_200+M13_orig.bin)          | 3D1A | 8.0K   |
|[Tandy 200                 |M14 orig](ROMs/Tandy_200+M14_orig.bin)          | 958C | 32K    |
|[Tandy 200                 |M15 orig](ROMs/Tandy_200+M15_orig.bin)          | 9535 | 32K    |
|[Televerket Modell 100     |orig](ROMs/Televerket_Modell_100+orig.bin)      | 2A64 | 32K    |
|[TRS-80 Model 100          |orig](ROMs/TRS-80_Model_100+orig.bin)           | 34F5 | 32K    |

### ROM Variants
Modified ROMs will have different checksums than the original. Examples:
* Y2K patches

* The Virtual T emulator can dynamically update the ROMs to show the
  version on the main menu. 

* Stephen Adolph's "[REX Classic][rexclassic]" Option ROM could
  replace the system ROM with a modified version for "[Main ROM
  Management][rexmanagement]".

[rexclassic]: https://github.com/bkw777/REX_Classic "Rex Classic Respin by BKW"
[rexmanagement]: https://bitchin100.com/wiki/index.php?title=Main_ROM_Management_Feature

See also this project's [directory of sample ROMs](ROMs). The files
are mostly mirrored from https://tandy.wiki/), but renamed so that
variations are listed after a plus sign.
|Machine Name               |Version                                              |CRC-16|ROM size|
|------------               |-------                                              |-----:|-------:|
|[Kyocera Kyotronic 85      |y2k](ROMs/Kyocera_Kyotronic_85+y2k.bin)              | 64A8 | 32K    |

|[NEC PC-8201               |A y2k](ROMs/NEC_PC-8201+A_y2k.bin)                   | 8CA0 | 32K    |
|[NEC PC-8201               |Japan](ROMs/NEC_PC-8201+Japan.bin)                   | 0508 | 32K    |

### Other related ROMs
These ROMs are not system ROMs for Kyotronic-like computers, but they
are related.
|Machine Name             |Version                                             |CRC-16|ROM size|
|------------             |-------                                             |-----:|-------:|
|[HD61830                 |lcd](ROMs/other/HD61830+lcd.bin)                    | 70C3 | 4.0K   |
|[NEC PC-8300 Beckman-E3.2|orig](ROMs/other/NEC_PC-8300_Beckman-E3.2+orig.bin) | 4793 | 32K    |
|[Tandy 600               |BASIC](ROMs/other/Tandy_600+BASIC.bin)              | A2B3 | 32K    |
